sentences.en: A solution envisaged for this problem consists in coating the metal hydrides.
sentences.cn: 解决这个问题的方法是把双金属包覆起来.

sentences.en: A zinc coating is applied to the steel for rust protection.
sentences.cn: 镀锌层是用来防止钢铁生锈的.

sentences.en: Apply a thin coating of glue to the surface.
sentences.cn: 在表面涂上薄薄的一层胶水.

sentences.en: In industry, diamond can form a tough, non-corrosive coating for tools.
sentences.cn: 在工业上，金刚石可以用作工具表面坚固、耐腐蚀的覆盖层。

sentences.en: It needs another coating of paint.
Sometimes even a very thin coating of luminous paint has been applied to the wires.
sentences.cn: 有的甚至在线上涂上一层薄薄的荧光漆.

sentences.en: Sugar coating hides the taste of pills.
sentences.cn: 糖衣掩盖了药片的药味.

sentences.en: The boy spat out the pill after eating off its sugar coating.
sentences.cn: 孩子吃掉药丸外面的糖,却把药吐了出来.

sentences.en: The coating is sprayed onto the specimen, air - dried to a soft powder.
sentences.cn: 这种涂料喷涂到试件上去并在空气中干燥之后,即成为松软的粉末.

sentences.en: The coating was a mixture of shellac and alcohol.
sentences.cn: 这种涂料是虫胶与酒精的混合物.

sentences.en: The latter can form a coating that is resilient.
sentences.cn: 后一种可形成一种有回弹力的涂层.

sentences.en: This special coating is designed to resist rust.
sentences.cn: 这一特别的涂层旨在抗锈.

sentences.en: Under the coating of dust and cobwebs, he discovered a fine French Louis XVI clock.
sentences.cn: 在一层灰尘和蜘蛛网底下，他发现了一座精美的法国路易十六时期的时钟。

words.tran_cn: 上涂料的，上胶的；穿外套的，覆盖着的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 涂层剂，涂布剂；覆盖剂
涂料；涂层材料；饰面材料；覆盖材料
电镀；电泳涂敷；电泳喷涂
环氧尸涂层；环氧树脂涂层
金属镀层法；金属镀层；包镀金属；金属敷层
纸张涂料；纸面涂布；纸上涂胶；纸面涂膜
聚氨酯涂料；聚氨酯敷层

trans.tran_cn: 涂层，覆盖层，（食品上的）面衣，糖衣，涂料，外衣布料上衣料，细呢，花呢
给…穿上外衣，覆盖，“coat”的现在分词
